<rule id="springboot-actuator-to-quarkus-0200" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <filecontent filename="application{profile}.{extension}" pattern="management.endpoints.web.exposure.include{wildcard}health"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace Spring Health endpoint mapping">
                    <message>
                        Replace `management.endpoints.web.exposure.include=health` with `quarkus.smallrye-health.root-path=/actuator/health`
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/smallrye-health" title="Quarkus Guide - Smallrye Health"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
            <where param="profile">
                <matches pattern=".*"/>
            </where>
            <where param="extension">
                <matches pattern="(properties|yml|yaml)"/>
            </where>
            <where param="wildcard">
                <matches pattern=".*"/>
            </where>
        </rule>
